title: 'Bitter that' cocktail
description: Bitter citrus flavours shine in this sophisticated yet simple party cocktail.

default: slice of fresh apricot, to decorate

steps: Put the vodka, Kammerling's, apricot syrup and golden grapefruit juice in a cocktail shaker with a handful of ice and shake hard.
Strain into a coupette glass and garnish with a slice of fresh apricot.
